```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
import json
from datetime import datetime

# Load music data
try:
    with open('/Users/arisbw/Documents/test-quarto/_data/music.json', 'r') as f:
        music_data = json.load(f)
    
    last_updated = datetime.fromisoformat(music_data['last_updated'])
    top_artists = music_data['top_artists']
    
    # Generate the music section content in the same style as other sections
    artists = '\n'.join([f'- {artist["name"]} ({artist["playcount"]} plays)' for artist in top_artists])
    
    print(f'''
{artists}

<p class="text-muted" style="font-size: 0.875rem; margin-top: 1rem;">*Last updated: {last_updated.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}*</p>
''')

except FileNotFoundError:
    print("*Music data currently unavailable*")
except Exception as e:
    print("*Error loading music data*")
```
